patterns: what charities does the organisation support

responses: The company supports many charities including; Marie Curie, Cancer UK, BHF and many more...

patterns: Does the company have any health benefits
Do i recieve any health benefits
what are the health benefits of this job
responses: Employee health benefits include, Health Insurance, Life Insurance and many others. Log in to your portal to find out more.

patterns: do i get paid when taking sick days
do i get sick pay
Does the company do sick benefits
do i get paid holiday
responses: Employee's get sick days and holidays with pay

patterns: can i work remotely from home
would working from home be possible
is remotely working from home possible
responses: Yes, you can work remotely from home 1 day a week, as long as you meet the deadlines set. Due to Covid-19 you can remotely work from home until further notice.

patterns: What schemes of pensions do you have
what pensions schemes do you do
do you assist with pension pay in
responses: The company pays 20% of your salary to your pension each month if, you pay 10% each month

patterns: when is my annual review
what is my annual review
responses: Your annual review is every 6 months and includes checking you are being paid enough, and to see if there is anymore training for you to do.

patterns: What is the staff turn over
whats the staff turn over
what is the staff turnover
responses: The staff turn over ranges from 12 months to 30 years

patterns: i have some personal issues
can we talk about personal issues
responses: I can't talk about this, but contacting your HR department can help.

patterns: Whats the emergency contact number
whats the emergency contact
whats the emergency disaster pandemic contact details?
responses: The contact number for emergencies only is 07123456778

responses: Have you lost your parking permit?

patterns: No
responses: You should have been given a parking permit when you were employeed but, if you didn't then you can apply on the website www.company.co.uk/parking_permits

patterns: Yes
responses: Pleaseapply on the website www.company.co.uk/lost_permits to get another parking permit

patterns: what do you do with my data

responses: We process your data following all the rules set by the GDPR and data Protection act 2018
